transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan sir aawaz aa rahi hai meri aapko?
Customer: Haan sir aa rahi hai. Meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Ji ji aa rahi hai. Ab bataiye.
Customer: Sir maine Vishwa IT Solution se IndiaMART ka package liya tha.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai?
Customer: But us time pe sir Pranjal sir the, woh meri profile jo the na woh manage kar rahe the.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Uh un unse jab maine kaha tha ki hamare paas lead kyun nahi aa rahi hai? Toh unhone kaha tha
Customer: Ek se do mahina wait karo, lead aayega.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Theek hai? Maine sir jo listing kar rakhi hai woh website ke relating maine listing kar rakhi hai. But mere paas jo leads aa rahi hai, mere paas jo leads aa rahi hai sir, ceiling fan ki aa rahi hai, kabhi perfumes ki woh aa rahi hai mere paas inquiry. Toh sir main perfume aur ceiling fan thodi na sale kar raha hun.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Sir aapko matlab IndiaMART company mere ko yeh samajh nahi aa raha woh kar kya rahe hain? Woh matlab fraud kar rahe hain, scam kar rahe hain, kya kar rahe hain? Aap ek cheez batao, saamne pehle mere ko trust dilate hain ki 33,000 ka package lo, uske baad hum jo hai na kaam aapka aage start kar denge. Aur jab woh cheez ho bhi gayi hai, uske baad na call receive kar rahe hain, na Pranjal sir receive kar rahe hain. Unhone ek sir ka number diya, woh bhi receive nahi kar rahe hain.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Yahi chalta hai kya sir aap yeh bataiye? Aisa hota hai kya sir jab jab main aapka customer nahi tha, jab aapka client nahi tha, tab toh sir aap itne acche se sare log treat kar rahe the ki haan aap paise do toh hum aapka business jo hai accha chalega, yeh hoga, woh hoga.
Executive: Theek hai. Dekhiye sir main first of all main aap aapse maafi chahunga agar aap koi call lead ek kar raha tha ya koi aapko pareshani hui uske liye. Dusri cheez sir first is isko ab main handle kar raha hun, theek hai? Toh main apne tarike Pranjal ji ne jo kiya like uske liye main ab keh sakte hain woh changes main nahi kar sakta. But yeh hai ki main apni or se sir dekhiye first of all main aapko cheeze bataun aapka jo product hai, theek hai? Yeh sara website designing ka hai. Mere same hi bilkul mere ek same hi customer hai main bata deta hun. Website designing ke regarding hai aur unhe daily daily basis par agar unke paas buylead nahi aata hai, unka bhi yahi concern hai same. Toh main unhe daily basis par buylead bhi share karta hun.
Executive: Theek hai. Sir dekhiye haan aapko buylead aapko buylead milega agar aap aapke buylead section mein buylead nahi aa pa raha hai, toh bhi main aapko buylead share karunga. Uski uski aap chinta mat kijiye, theek hai? Dusri cheez sir dekhiye India IndiaMART mein IndiaMART mein dekhiye sare jo employee hain kaam karne wale woh ek hi tarike se kaam nahi karte hain. Mera kaam karne ka tarika alag hai, theek hai? Main aapko yeh cheez surety de raha hun ki aapko daily buylead jayegi, theek hai? Toh aap us cheez ke liye tension mat lijiye. Main abhi ek group bhi create kara dunga sir jo jisme mere senior manager bhi rahenge, theek hai?
Customer: Sir main yeh keh raha hun ki
Customer: Haan theek hai sir meri baat suniye aap. Jab kya kehte hain uh jis din se maine package liya tha, theek hai? Us din se leke abhi tak agar mere paas paanch ya chhe lead bhi aa jati na, uske se do teen bhi aati, main manta ki haan ho sakta hai working delay ho raha ho ya utne clients nahi hai jo bhi hai, main manta. But teen se char mahine tak koi bhi response hi nahi aa raha sir, iska matlab kya hai? Pranjal sir ne jab mere ko shuru mein aise treat kiya tha, itne acche se kiya tha, uh yahan tak ki jo listing wagera ki thi unhone hi ki thi. Aur unhone kaha tha ek mahina aap wait kar lo sir, uske baad jo hai aayegi. Ek mahine se sir do dhai mahine ho gaye. Pranjal sir ne ek sir ka number diye, unhone call uthane sahi nahi samjha, unhone message ka reply dene sahi nahi samjha. Toh sir aap package 33,000 ke kya karwa rahe hain sir, bataiye?
Executive: Dekhiye main
Customer: Aap toh apna profit kar rahe hain.
Executive: Dekhiye IndiaMART sir sirf customers ke liye kaam karta hai, theek hai? IndiaMART ko profit nahi chahiye kisi cheez ke liye. Hum sabko jode rakhte hain isiliye kyunki hamare aath aath das das saal se purane customers hain. Woh isiliye hai na ki sir hum pe trust karte hain. Dusri cheez main aapko number ke liye baat karun, toh main abhi apna personal number aapko share karunga, theek hai? Ek main aapko ek group bhi proper ek group create karunga jisme aapke regarding jo buyleads hain woh aayengi, theek hai? Aur aap mujhe kuch thode bahut keywords bata dijiyega, thoda dekhiye main
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello aawaz aa rahi hai sir meri?
Customer: Are yaar. Hello?
Executive: Haan ab abhi aa rahi hai aawaz?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received relevant buyleads.

- Feels scammed due to lack of support.

- Previous executive not responding after payment.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive will personally handle the account.

- Executive will share buyleads daily.

- Executive will create a group with senior manager.

- Executive shared his personal number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer support, resolution
